tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MetaTags (
  page_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  meta_title TEXT,
  meta_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PageDescriptions (
  page_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  page_title TEXT,
  full_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PageMetaMap (
  map_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  page_id INT REFERENCES MetaTags(page_id),
  meta_id INT REFERENCES MetaTags(meta_id)
)

CREATE TABLE meta_tags (
  page_url STRING PRIMARY KEY,
  title STRING,
  keywords STRING,
  description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE page_descriptions (
  page_url STRING PRIMARY KEY,
  author STRING,
  last_modified TIMESTAMP,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE page_links (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  page_url STRING,
  external_url STRING
)

CREATE TABLE page_categories (
  category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE page_combinations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  page_url STRING,
  category_id UUID
)
